# summary()

**Instance Method**

Generates a data frame that summarizes the columns of the data frame slice.

## Declaration

```swift
func summary() -> DataFrame
```

## Summarizing a Slice

- **summary(of:)**: Generates a data frame that summarizes the columns you select by name.
- **summary(ofColumns:)**: Generates a data frame that summarizes the columns you select by index.
- **SummaryColumnIDs**: The summary data frame column identifiers.

items.description: Generates a data frame that summarizes the columns you select by name.
